enum: Incoming Webhooks can post messages to channels with a generated token
Channel Follower Webhooks are internal webhooks used with Channel Following to post new messages into channels
Application webhooks are webhooks used with Interactions

guild_id.description: OPTIONAL: the guild id this webhook is for, if any

channel_id.description: OPTIONAL: the channel id this webhook is for, if any

user.description: OPTIONAL: the user this webhook was created by (not returned when getting a webhook with its token)

name.description: OPTIONAL: the default name of the webhook

avatar.description: OPTIONAL: the default user avatar hash of the webhook

token.description: OPTIONAL: the secure token of the webhook (returned for Incoming Webhooks)

application_id.description: OPTIONAL: the bot/OAuth2 application that created this webhook

source_guild.description: OPTIONAL: the partial guild of the channel that this webhook is following (returned for Channel Follower Webhooks)

name.description: guild name (2-100 characters, excluding trailing and leading whitespace)

source_channel.description: OPTIONAL: the partial channel that this webhook is following (returned for Channel Follower Webhooks)

name.description: the name of the channel (1-100 characters)

url.description: OPTIONAL: the url used for executing the webhook (returned by the webhooks OAuth2 flow)
